title: Permas
body: I had a friend get perma-banned. With the subject of tyler1's unban running around, I'm bringing a poll onto the board to see if anyone agrees with me. I think we should do a mass unban for people who were banned for toxicity and keep them all on a "one more slip-up you're done" for a certain amount of time (the equivalent of getting to 30 maybe?). Vote yes or no in the poll, and remember, opinions running wild, don't get too triggered.

replies.body:
If people get permabanned, then they have done/said lots of rude things on a regular basis.

Give them a 2nd chance? so now every 1 gonna get perma ban 1 time + another life line? all those warning period lead up to the banning is not enough to get through their thick skull? 

If it that thick in the 1st place what make you think it wont happen again? beside, they can remake account to play again any way. If they dont want to, then that just mean the game isnt enjoyable any more.
they have already had their 2nd chance, and 3rd,4th etc. perma ban is the last resort
